quest.name: A Peach by Any Other Name
journal:
Serendipity would help you procure a doll for Little Ladies' Day.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

Eshtaime's Lapidaries is in need of a trustworthy adventurer who can promote its entry in the Little Ladies' Day doll contest. With the princess doll in tow, Serendipity would have you visit Gridania, offering the gossiping girls there budding blossoms in the spirit of the festival.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

※The Princess Edvya doll minion will be lost upon dismissing it or logging out of the game. The doll can be retrieved by speaking with Serendipity.

Delighted by your beautiful blossoms and the Princess Edvya doll, the gossiping girls have chosen to vote for Eshtaime's Lapidaries' contest entry. Head back to Ul'dah and tell Serendipity of the good news.

Although the results are not yet final, Serendipity is pleased to tell you that your efforts have placed the doll from Eshtaime's Lapidaries very high in this year's rankings. Its jubilant demeanor is sure to impress even more little ladies as the contest continues.
objectives: With the Edvya doll minion summoned, offer blossoms to gossiping girls in Gridania.
Report to Serendipity at the Goldsmiths' Guild.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Eager to hear my plan, then? Excellent!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: As you might imagine, we've received hundreds of orders in the weeks, even months leading up to the contest. Why, our most doll-crazed customers placed their orders not days after last year's festivities ended!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: After hearing so many of them boast and brag about their intentions to demolish their opponents, I'm starting to wonder if they've forgotten what Little Ladies' Day is truly about.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Yes...I can't put my finger on it, but I am convinced that you will bring something special to this contest─something none of the guild's other clients can.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: And so this is what I propose: Eshtaime's Lapidaries will submit its own entry to the contest. The goal is to win, then sell the doll at auction.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Your job will be to visit each of the city–states, putting this masterwork on display for all to admire and adore.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Little ladies of all nations will be casting their votes, after all, and they are not like to vote for a doll they have not seen.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: I trust that traversing the realm will not overly trouble an accomplished adventurer such as yourself.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: I've no doubt you're well accustomed to teleporting all about the place. I suppose it's faster, albeit slightly more expensive, but─ Ahem. Where was I? Oh, yes!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: An admirable plan, is it not? You get to partake in the festivities, Eshtaime's Lapidaries gets its publicity, and I can get back to filling the several hundred commissions I'm neglecting at this very moment. Everybody wins!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: And now, the moment you've been waiting for. Behold, your very own Princess Edvya doll!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Isn't she darling? And if you thought you'd have to carry her, think again! You'll find she's quite capable of getting around on her own.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: I recommend you first travel to Gridania. The little ladies there love to gossip, making it the perfect place for your doll's debut. Oh, and take these blossoms as well─a small gift will go a long way toward winning their hearts.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The Princess Edvya doll minion must remain summoned in order to progress in this quest.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The Princess Edvya doll minion will be lost upon dismissing it or logging out of the game.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The doll can be retrieved by speaking with Serendipity.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Oh, Forename... I have a feeling I know why you're here...

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Tell Serendipity you lost the doll?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: No

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Haha, no need to fret. She knows to return home when lost. Now off you go, and be sure to enjoy yourself!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Oh? Everything is fine? Wonderful! Well, off you go, then! Be sure to tell me all about your trip to Gridania when you're done.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: The gossiping girls of Gridania will spread word of the doll for us. Just remember to hand each a blossom for Little Ladies' Day.

dialogue.name: CHARISMA
dialogue.text: Dolls, dolls, dolls...each more beautiful than the next, yet none of them speak to me. Did Princess Edvya concern herself with glory and riches? I think not!

dialogue.name: CHARISMA
dialogue.text: Dolls, dolls, dolls...each more beautiful than the next, yet none of them speak to me. Did Princess Edvya concern herself with glory and riches? I think not!

dialogue.name: CHARISMA
dialogue.text: Flowers? For me? That's terribly sweet of you.

dialogue.name: CHARISMA
dialogue.text: Did you know that peach blossoms were in full bloom on the very day that Princess Edvya went missing all those years ago? It is to honor her memory that the flower was adopted as the symbol of Little Ladies' Day, adorning the town as you see today.

dialogue.name: CHARISMA
dialogue.text: 'Tis rare to see one who remembers the old traditions in this day and age. Why, even your doll is dressed in traditional garb! Well, I know who I'm voting for this year. Ah, if only I could have a doll like this of my very own!

dialogue.name: CHARISMA
dialogue.text: What's that, you say? Eshtaime's Lapidaries plans to put this selfsame doll up for sale after the judging is over? It looks like a visit to Ul'dah just might be in order!

dialogue.name: CHARISMA
dialogue.text: I wish you the best of luck in the contest! Not that you're like to need it, with such a masterpiece as your entry.

dialogue.name: CHARISMA
dialogue.text: This is the one day of the year where I have the chance to be treated like a princess, but all my friends care about is winning that blasted contest. <sigh> So here I am all alone, feeling like a pauper.

dialogue.name: CHARISMA
dialogue.text: This is the one day of the year where I have the chance to be treated like a princess, but all my friends care about is winning that blasted contest. <sigh> So here I am all alone, feeling like a pauper.

dialogue.name: CHARISMA
dialogue.text: Oh, I shall treasure these more than any gem! Thank you, misssir.

dialogue.name: CHARISMA
dialogue.text: They say the peach blossom was emblazoned on the royal family's coat of arms during the Thorne Dynasty. It's why the peach blossom has become so deeply entwined with Little Ladies' Day─to remember Sultan Baldric Thorne, and the kindness he showed that poor miller girl in the tale so often retold.

dialogue.name: CHARISMA
dialogue.text: Such a lovely doll─as beautiful as any blossom, I say. If you're competing in the doll contest, rest assured that my vote is yours. It's the least I can do to repay your kindness.

dialogue.name: CHARISMA
dialogue.text: Best of fortune to you, misssir. You've certainly earned my vote.

dialogue.name: CHARISMA
dialogue.text: Of all the festivals held here in Gridania, Little Ladies' Day has to be my favorite, although I cannot help but feel something is amiss this year...

dialogue.name: CHARISMA
dialogue.text: Of all the festivals held here in Gridania, Little Ladies' Day has to be my favorite, although I cannot help but feel something is amiss this year...

dialogue.name: CHARISMA
dialogue.text: More peach blossoms? But of course! There were far more peach trees in bloom around the Twelveswood last year. It was the perfect way to pay homage to Princess Edvya and the tradition of charity she gave birth to.

dialogue.name: CHARISMA
dialogue.text: What's more, planting saplings gives me reason to use the new gardening kit I purchased a few moons past. You wouldn't believe what a bargain it was, and made with high-quality darksteel to─

dialogue.name: CHARISMA
dialogue.text: Ahem, excuse me. I got carried away for a moment. Is that a doll for the contest? Why, it's as pretty as a peach. You can count on my vote for the contest. Oh, think nothing of it─thanks to you, I finally have a use for my new gardening tools!

dialogue.name: CHARISMA
dialogue.text: I pray you do well in the contest. Now where did I put that shovel?

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Welcome back, Forename! You're just in time. Not long ago I received word of the contest rankings.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: It looks like you're slowly climbing up to number one! The little ladies of Gridania must have really been taken with you and the doll.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: She is oft reluctant to express her emotions─as princesses are wont to be─but I'm sure she's excited to hear the news, as well.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: I've crafted many a doll for this contest, and yet I find myself growing more and more partial to this one. If I had a vote, I daresay it would go to you.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: And it would appear that this little lady has grown partial to you as well, Forename. This is only the beginning, though. Keep up the good work and you're sure to win!
